name: changedetection
description: changedetection.io is a self-hosted web service that monitors website content for changes and sends notifications when updates occur. It supports diff highlighting, scheduled checks, RSS feeds, and multi-user dashboards.

features.title: Website Monitoring
features.description: Track changes on any website automatically. Never miss updates

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Get alerts when content changes. Stay informed

features.title: Diff Highlighting
features.description: Visual comparison of changes. See exactly what changed

features.title: Scheduled Checks
features.description: Automatic monitoring at custom intervals. Hands-free operation

features.title: Rss Feeds
features.description: Subscribe to changes via RSS. Flexible consumption

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Team dashboards for collaborative monitoring. Shared visibility

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete privacy for your monitoring data. Your watchlist, your control
